events.message: I received the laptop yesterday but noticed it has a large scratch on the screen and some keys are sticky. This is very disappointing as I expected a flawless product.
The issue has been categorized under Product Defect after reviewing the report about the damaged laptop screen and faulty keyboard.
The case has been assigned to an agent specialized in product defects to handle the situation and provide assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I'll do my best to help you resolve these problems quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch on the screen and the keyboard keys that are sticky? This will help us assess the damage better.
I have attached pictures showing the scratch on the screen and the keyboard with sticky keys. Please let me know what can be done as soon as possible.
Thank you for the pictures. We can offer a replacement laptop or repair service free of charge. Which option do you prefer?
I would prefer a replacement laptop since the damage seems extensive. Thank you for the prompt offer to solve this issue.
We have processed your replacement order. The new laptop will be shipped out today with expedited delivery and tracking details will be sent shortly.
Just checking in to make sure the replacement laptop arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the solution provided.
As we have not received any further issues from you, this case will now be closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
